mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN CREATED_AT BETWEEN #{todayStart} AND #{todayEnd} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TODAY_CNT, SUM(CASE WHEN CREATED_AT BETWEEN #{monthStart} AND #{monthEnd} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MONTH_CNT, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM USER_CLIENT

select.foreach:
SELECT #{year} as "year",
SUM(CASE WHEN CREATED_AT BETWEEN #{year} || '-' || LPAD(#{month}, 2, '0') || '-01 00:00:00' AND #{year} || '-' || LPAD(#{month}, 2, '0') || '-' || TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(#{year} || '-' || LPAD(#{month}, 2, '0') || '-01'), 'DD') || ' 23:59:59' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "month_${month}"
FROM USER_CLIENT
